ack.p: We are grateful to Cesar Garzon and his colleagues for providing us with their observational data of the parakeets in the years 2011 and 2012. This study was partially supported by the German Research Foundation (DFG), the National Science Foundation through the Network for Sustainable Climate Risk Management (SCRiM) under NSF cooperative agreement GEO-1240507 and the Penn State Center for Climate Risk Management. The article processing charge was funded by the German Research Foundation (DFG) and the University of Freiburg in the funding programme Open Access Publishing. Any opinions, findings, and conclusions or recommendations expressed in this manuscript are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of the funding entities.
